I'd also recommend people carefully read the terms of service of these plac=
es before uploading anything.=A0 Some have snuck into those terms language =
which gives them the ownership rights to anything you post: rights which ca=
n include republishing your files, or selling them for profit, with no furt=
her permission from you needed.

k@...> wrote:

a pretty good amount of storage space with the free account.
=A0
Zack


On =
Wed, May 13, 2009 at 9:07 AM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostres=
earch. com> wrote:









This type of file sharing is new to me. I have =
a photo album site for sharing and uploading photos, but you can't upload f=
iles. I didn't know there were file sharing sites until joined this group, =
but I had always thought there should be.

=A0


----- Original Message ---=
-- 
From: Misty 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 



Sent: Wednesday, May 13, =
2009 12:58 AM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: File uploading rules DO NOT UPLOAD WAV=
 FILES



LOL Snowfire! Nope it was not you this time. Others should read b=
efore they post because we just addressed this subject. Esnips is very easy=
 to use it has two uploading options in case you cant use the java applicat=
ion use the single file uploader. Works alot like email upload attachments.=



If you need more help just holler and I am sure one of us will be more t=
han willing to help you figure it out. Posting from email as an attachment =
also works just not so well for the very large file sizes. There are many o=
ther file sharing storage places besides esnips. We just like the layout th=
ere and the ability to share with friends including sharing storage space.
=


Misty
